<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

var url = baseUrl.replace(/.html/,'')
var html = url+'_'+i+'.html';
list.push({text:'ç¬¬'+i+'é¡µ',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.response.collection.name

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

ruleExplore.author:
<js>
if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")||baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")){
java.getString('td.1@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getString('p.0@a.0@text||class.panel-heading.0@a.1@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
java.getString('td.2@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("shouding/")||baseUrl.endsWith("reader/")){
java.getString('td.3@a@text');
}
else if(/rongyao_[45]/.test(baseUrl)){
java.getString('td.4@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("twelvekings")){
java.getString('td.5@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getString('class.author@a.0@text');
}
</js>
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
java.getElements('@css:.panel-heading,tbody tr');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getElements('class.book-img-text@li');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getElements('class.panel panel-default&&class.well well-sm table-responsive')
}
else{
result=java.getElements('tbody@tr');
if(baseUrl.includes("badge/")){
result=['Î²'].concat(result);
}
result;

	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//è¿”å›åˆ—è¡¨
return m
}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
uri = String(uri)
    .replace('chapterList', 'content')
    .replace('.html', '/');
_ = {
    result: {
        list: []
    }
};
push = __ => _.result.list.push(__);
$.list.map($ => {
    if ($.name) {
        push({
            name: $.name,
            volume: true
        });
    }
    $.list.map($ => {
        if ($.has_content == 1) {
            url = java.base64Encode(uri + $.id + '.html');
            $.url = `data:;base64,${url},{"type":"${type}"}`;
            return push($);
        }
    })
})
JSON.stringify(_);
</js>$.result.list[*]

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
source_url = baseUrl.replace('/004?','/005?');
data = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data;

con  = data.map($=>{
	  // year = $.year;
l =	$.data.map(($,i)=>{	
		intro =  'ã€'+$.qishu+'ã€‘';
		url =  baseUrl.replace(/qishu=.*&bkId/,"qishu="+$.qishu+ "&bkId"); 				
return	 JSON.stringify({"intro":intro,"url":url});
	});
return l
	}).join(',');
	$ = JSON.parse(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify("["+con+"]")));

n = 0;
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;
url = $[x].url;

result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\nğŸ“Œä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜ï¼š æ ¹æ®åºå·è®¾ç½®ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡æ¥åˆ‡æ¢æœŸåˆŠ(é»˜è®¤0)\nğŸ¯å½“å‰æœŸåˆŠï¼šåºå·ğŸ”º'+x+'ğŸ”»'+$[x].intro+(x==0?' (é»˜è®¤)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\nâ¤åºå·ğŸ”º'+i+'ğŸ”»'+$[i].intro;
	}
result.tocUrl = $[x].url;
result.remark = y;
}

result = JSON.stringify(result);

}
catch(e){
	result = JSON.parse(result).data;
	result.tocUrl = baseUrl;
	result = JSON.stringify(result);
}
</js>

	}
}
list

result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	java.log(CCC[0]+"----"+CCC[1]);
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");
